    Setup fishing mortality and catch observations

    Setup_Mod_Catch_and_F.Rd

    Setup fishing mortality and catch observations

    Setup_Mod_Catch_and_F(
  input_list,
  ObsCatch,
  Catch_Type,
  UseCatch,
  Use_F_pen = 1,
  est_all_regional_F = 1,
  Catch_Constant = NULL,
  sigmaC_spec = NULL,
  censor_regional_catch = 0,
  ub_catch_censor = NA,
  lb_catch_censor = NA,
  catch_censor_sd = NA,
  ...
)

    Arguments

    input_list

    List containing a data list, parameter list, and map list

    ObsCatch

    Array of observed catches dimensioned by n_regions, n_years, n_fish_fleets

    Catch_Type

    Matrix of catch types dimensioned n_years, n_fish_fleets, == 0 indicates years to use aggregated catch, == 1 indicates years to use region specific catch

    UseCatch

    Array of indicator variables dimensioned by n_regions, n_years, n_fish_fleets, == 0 don't use catch, == 1 use catch and fit

    Use_F_pen

    Indicator number specifying whether a f penalty is applied == 0, don't apply, == 1 apply

    est_all_regional_F

    Indicator number specifying whether all regional fishing mortality deviates are estimated, == 0 some F's are not regional and are aggregated, == 1 all fishing mortality deviates are regional

    Catch_Constant

    A vector dimensioned by n_fish_fleets specifying the constant to add to catch observations

    sigmaC_spec

    Observation error specificaiotn for catch. Default behavior is to estimate it for all regions and fishery fleets. Other options include: "est_shared_f" which estimates it but shares it across fishery fleets, "est_shared_r" which estimates it but shares across regions (unique for each fleet), "est_shared_r_f which estimates it but shares across regions and fleets, and "fix" which fixes it at the starting value.

    censor_regional_catch

    Numeric for whether to censor catch if aggregated catch (0 == don't censor, 1 == censor)

    ub_catch_censor

    Upper bound for aggregated catch if censor_regional_catch is specified. Dimensions should be n_regions, n_years (for aggregated years), and n_fish_fleets

    lb_catch_censor

    Lower bound for aggregated catch if censor_regional_catch is specified. Dimensions should be n_regions, n_years (for aggregated years), and n_fish_fleets

    catch_censor_sd

    Catch censoring standard deviation (single value). Smaller values mean it should definitely be within the bound, larger = more flexbility.

    ...

    Additional arguments specifying starting values for fishery parameters (ln_sigmaC, ln_F_mean, ln_F_devs, ln_F_mean_AggCatch)
